Description.Text: The cottage include fireplace, DVD player and CD player in the sitting area, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave, first aid kit, baby cot, baby chair, hammock, BBQ corner, outdoor stone oven, outdoor sitting/dining area and gardens

Hotel is situated in a corner of an olive grove, near the small mountain village of Vatos, 14 km west of Corfu town, 14km from the airport, about 3 km from Myrtiotissa Glyfada and Ermones beaches, 800 m from the beach, 250m from the bus station, 300m from the super market.
